name: Serge
appearance: Broad-shouldered with a filed tusk and a patched Watch coat. A bone whistle hangs at his throat; arms crisscrossed by training scars.
character: Duty-first pragmatist who prefers clear rules and clear lines. Protective of his patrol and suspicious of ‘cleverness.’
talents: remembers faces and ration bites after one meeting
can silence a crowd with a single blast cadence
dreams: Rise to Legate and restore morale without temple strings
Clean the Watch of Night-Glass leaks
secrets: Accepted a Night-Glass bribe once to look the wrong way at a mirror-drop
Keeps an unsent confession to Legate Corvell stitched into his coat lining
